name: Integrated Footwork Shadowboxing
description: Move through striking combinations with constant angle changes and stance resets.

name: Banded Triplanar Tap
description: Single-leg stance with band around knees; tap opposite foot forward/side/back without losing base.

name: Rotational Med Ball Shotput
description: Lateral throw from a loaded stance, initiating power from the back foot.

name: Depth Drop to Stabilize
description: Step off box and stick landing softly, absorbing impact through hips and knees.

name: Sprawl to Quick Strikes
description: Drop into a sprawl then explosively pop up into a combination.
